name: GMTK19
description:
The newest build can be found here: https://fachschafttf.gitlab.io/gmtk19gamejam/
We had some bugs and wanted to fix them ; )

Maybe the version is the same as above. We are confused :D

A long time ago, a star fell on our world. In a place, that nobody knows, he was hidden for years........... 

.....But one day in our world, the stars in the sky disappeared. 
Everything was wrapped in a deep black........

Creatures of darkness, with red glowing eyes, ruled over us!

At one day in this lost world, you will come to a place that nobody knows and find the little star.
In a small lantern you try to bring the little star out of this place and protect him from the creatures.




So he and you and hopefully the entire world can see a glimmer of hope in the sky.........

Creatures from the darkness:

The Fat Rat The Blood Moth
